amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits.

action.text: Amendment SA 119 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 119 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 51. Record Vote Number: 28.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 119.

Amendment SA 119 proposed by Senator Bunning to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S895-896; text: CR S895-896) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 119 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 51. Record Vote Number: 28.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 119 proposed by Senator Bunning to Amendment SA 100.
